subject: Swimming
lead_paragraph: The three-time Olympic gold medalist Ryan Lochte won the 200-yard backstroke in 1 minute 38.49 seconds at the U.S. Short Course championships in Atlanta, giving him four titles in three days. Mary DeScenza won five titles after taking the 200 backstroke and butterfly.
